item.title: Rune-Storm - HD Graphics - New Server - Need players
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

So the advertisement thread is a bit plain besides the big pictures that are being used, how about providing some media instead of these two pictures explaining the features? And, I love that theme but there’s so much space that isn’t being used in that header, it makes me want to tear up. I still love that theme though, the color scheme is VERY nice in my opinion. Also, that forum moderator crown looks a bit ridiculous and hideous.

Other than that, please provide more media to attract more attention to the thread. I wish the best of luck with the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune-Storm - HD Graphics - New Server - Need players
